Dumbbell-assisted pull-ups: This exercise can be done by attaching a dumbbell to a pull-up bar and performing a standard pull-up with the weight of the dumbbell assisting you. This can help increase the resistance and challenge your upper body.
Dumbbell lunges: This exercise can be done by holding a dumbbell in each hand and performing lunges with each leg. This can help target the legs, glutes, and core muscles.
Dumbbell shoulder press: This exercise can be done by standing with a dumbbell in each hand and pressing them overhead. This can help target the shoulders and upper back muscles.
Dumbbell curls: This exercise can be done by holding a dumbbell in each hand and curling them towards your body. This can help target the bicep muscles.
Dumbbell tricep extensions: This exercise can be done by holding a dumbbell in each hand and extending your arms behind your head. This can help target the tricep muscles.
